dict.acceptation: 培根；熏猪肉；咸猪肉；腊肉；

sent.orig: Step 1 Cut bacon into small strips. Simmer bacon for 10 minutes in water. Dry bacon.
sent.trans: 第一步：将培根切小条，沸水中炖煮十分钟左右，捞出沥干备用。

sent.orig: Aiken Bacon was baking bacon. The bacon he was baking was bought in Macon.
sent.trans: 艾肯·培根在烘熏猪肉。他烤熏的猪肉是从梅肯买进。

sent.orig: Aiken Bacon was baking bacon, the bacon he was baking was bought in Macon.
sent.trans: 阿肯。培根在烤制熏咸肉，他烤的熏咸肉是从梅肯买来的。所以他在做梅肯烤培根。

sent.orig: Yeah, bacon and eggs with buttered toast. I like my bacon very crisp.
sent.trans: 是的，熏肉、鸡蛋和抹黄油的面包片，我喜欢熏肉脆一些。
